SIGNIN.alreadyHaveAnAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

common.name: Name
common.editAndInvite: Edit and invite people to your test
common.inputImage: Input an image of your choice referent to the topic
common.title: Title

descriptions.edit: Start creating and editing your test.
descriptions.cooperators: Invite people to help you in your test.
descriptions.reports: Take a look at how your evaluators are doing.
descriptions.answers: See how your evaluators are evaluating your project.
descriptions.analytics: Analyze comments and answers from your evaluators.
descriptions.finalReport: Add additional data to your test.

intro.reports: Keep track of your evaluators progress and answering status while they complete your test.
intro.answers: Quickly get feedback on you project by analyzing data from other users' answers.
intro.analytics: Take a deep look into your test and see what people are saying about it.
intro.invite: Invite evaluators to answer your test!
intro.cooperators: Add cooperators who can help you improve your project and gather data for your studies.
intro.edit: Create and customize your tasks and heuristics for your research needs.

errors.signupWithInvitationEmail: User needs to signup using the same email as the invitation.
errors.passwordValidate: Password must be at least 6 characters

Introduction.title: UX Remote LAB
Introduction.subtitle: What about doing Usability Tests in remote?
Introduction.description: Join our OpenSource project and start creating your own usability LAB and share it with friends. Researching has never been easier!

messages.noHeuristics: You don't have any heuristic, create one to proceed.
messages.youMustHave: You must have typen something wrong...
messages.noHeuristicsDeleteAll: Sorry, but you can't delete all heuristics questions
messages.noCsvFileSelected: No CSV file selected. Please select one before proceeding.
messages.changeWeights: Be aware that by changing the order of the heuristics, the weights DO NOT change automatically, you must change them manually.

validation.positiveValue: Value must be a positive number
validation.addQuestion: Please add at least one question to your heuristic

messages.atLeast2HeuristicsForWeighting: Need at least 2 heuristics to be able to place the weights.

messages.acceptCsv: If you accept, all your present heuristics will be replaced by the ones in the .csv file
messages.noCsvFileSelected:
No csv file selected. 
Please select one before proceeding.

messages.submitTest: Are you sure you want to submit this test?
messages.submitOnce: Are you sure you want to submit your test. You can only do it once.
messages.noHeuristics: This test don't have any heuristic

messages.graphForMoreThan3: The graphic can only be generated with 3 or more evaluators,please collect more data from your research to proceed.

messages.needMoreThan1Answer: This page needs more than 1 answer to be generated.
messages.runWeightFunction: This page needs weight function (python) to be running, can be in emulators or in deploy mode, and the weights to be full marked on your creating test page.

messages.confirm_delete_report: Are you sure you want to delete this report?
messages.sure_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete {user}'s report? This action can't be undone.

messages.no_users: There are no users registered with that email, press enter to select anyways.
messages.remove_cooperator: Are you sure you want to remove {email} from the cooperators?
messages.cancel_invitation: Are you sure you want to cancel {email} from the cooperators?
messages.change_role: Are you sure you want to change {email}'s role from {old} to {new}?
messages.message_title_hint: Type a title for your message
messages.message_content_hint: Type the content of your message

AccessNotAllowed.noAccess: You do not have access to the page you're trying to access.

intros.docSubtitle: Click to access the documentation on how to use the page
intros.discSubtitle: You will find support on our discord server.

finalReport.createHeuristics: Please create Heuristics so you can select them here.
finalReport.createUserTask: Please create Tasks so you can select them here.
finalReport.ContructionParagraph: We're working hard to improve our website. Please check back soon!

landing.feedbackTitle: Quickly get feedback on your projects
landing.feedbackSubtitle1: UX Remote LAB has been created to give a set of tools for different UX experts that want to create their own UX tests and perform it with the users.
landing.feedbackSubtitle2: COVID-19 has shown to the world that sometimes the physical presence of real users is not possible so we are here to solve this problem!
landing.uxSubtitle1: If you are a researcher, a company, or a professional that you want to perform an UX test, here you will find several tools to help to analyze and track your tests using different UX techniques.
landing.uxSubtitle2: Help us to grow up this Open Source community and join us on GitHub! :)
landing.footer: We are looking for new partners to help us to grow the project! Feel free to contact us on

createTest.title: Create a new test
createTest.blanckSubtitle: Create a blank test to begin with a completely new and fresh template.
createTest.templateSubtitle: Create a test based on a template created by one of our users.
createTest.public: Make test public to all users (readonly)

alerts.deleteTest: Are you sure you want to delete this test?
alerts.leave: Are you sure you want to leave?
alerts.sureLeave: Are you sure you want to leave? All your changes will be discarded
alerts.deleteHeuristic: Are you sure delete the heuristic
alerts.deleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
